page.title: 04**** WILDLIFE (Fauna) ****
page.content: The habitat of Llynclys Pool supports an eco_system including,as well as the plants described,water spiders,skaters diving and whirligig beetles,boatmen, dragonflies,crane _ and hover_flies, minnow,stickleback,carp,perch,mallard, geese,moorhen,heron,frogs,toads and newts.The whole area's insect_life in_ cludes common species : Eg we saw Red Admiral,Tortoiseshell,Orange Tip,Comm_ on Blue,Wall,Small Copper and Heath butterflies.The birdlife,too,is ex_ ceptional _ less common varieties in_ clude Redwing,Goldcrest,Buzzard and Kestrel,Barn Owl and Partridge.Wild mammals here include fox,hedgehog,gr_ ey squirrel,house_,field_ and wood_ mice;harvestmice,doormice,bank and water voles,shrews,brown rats,badgers polecats,stoats and weasels.Here,too, are slow worms,lizards,and (less com_ mon) grass snakes and adders.
